description:
Komaba Ichirou is one of Yuugo`s close friends and a skilled baseball player, Komaba dreams of becoming a professional ball player so he can use the money he earns in the league to improve his family`s dairy farm. He is also Aki`s childhood friend and neighbour, and their closeness is a constant source of jealousy for Yuugo. However, once Komaba`s family goes bankrupt and their farm is sold to pay their debt, he is forced to quit Yezo and look for a job to make ends meet.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Komaba Ichirou
